oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Utjecaj suvremene industrije, poljoprivredne proizvodnje i morala na zagadivanje čovjekove okoline
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Znaor, Darko
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: "Organics" in general
Farming Systems
Social aspects
Soil
Food systems
Policy environments and social economy
Environmental aspects
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The paper provides an overview on major environmental problems caused by farming practices (and to a degree by industry). It discuses various problems related to declining soil fertility, use of pesticides, accumulation of heavy metals in agricultural soils, etc. Finally, it questions validity and enforcement of some environmental and agricultural legislation and argues that the way out is in adopting organic and bio-dynamic farming.
